item.title: Ereban: Shadow Legacy coming to PS5, Xbox Series in 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Stealth action platformer currently available for PC.

Publisher Selecta Play and developer Baby Robot Games will release stealth action platformer Ereban: Shadow Legacy for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series in 2026, the companies announced.

Ereban: Shadow Legacy first launched for PC via Steam on April 10, 2024.

In addition to the digital release, Selecta Play will also release physical standard and Collector’s editions of Ereban: Shadow Legacy for PlayStation 5 in North America and Europe. The Collector’s Edition will include the original soundtrack, a key chain of Ayana’s mask, three art postcards, two iron-on patches (Helios and Forgotten Sun), and a collector’s box.

Here is an overview of the game, via Baby Robot Games:

About

Ereban: Shadow Legacy is a fast-paced stealth platformer game where you become Ayana, the last descendant of a forgotten race. Harness mystical shadow powers, high-tech gadgets and avoid or kill to uncover the truth about your past and the key to saving a dying, morally grey universe. What will your legacy be?

Become One with the Shadows

Experience an unprecedented combination of stealth and shadows with the Shadow Merge ability. Dive into shadows and move freely through them to climb walls, reach inaccessible places, attack from cover or advance unseen.

Absorb echoes to learn more lethal and non-lethal shadow powers, craft high-tech gadgets, and combine all this with your agility to infiltrate Helios lines and investigate what they are hiding.

Define Your Shadow Legacy… And Live with the Consequences

Avoid or kill. Spare or consume. The decision is yours: how far are you willing to go to uncover the truth?

Approach each level with your own style of play. Use your powers to move like a ghost or strike as a deadly shadow in this sci-fi universe where actions go beyond good and evil.

Explore a Dying, Beautiful World in Your Search of the Truth

As the last descendant of the Ereban, unravel the mystery of who you are and what happened to your people. Traverse the ruins of lifeless cities, infiltrate sci-fi facilities carved into ancient temples and discover the remnants of your forgotten race.

Uncover the truth about Helios, the cryptic energy megacorporation that claims to have solved the energy crisis.

item.title: State of Play Japan set for November 11, featuring updates on games from Japan and Asia
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5

Over 40 minutes of announcements, updates, and more.

Sony Interactive Entertainment will host State of Play Japan, a special broadcast focused on games created in Japan and Asia, on November 11 at 2:00 p.m. PT / 5:00 p.m. ET / November 12 at 7:00 a.m. JST, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube (English subtitles, Japanese audio).

The broadcast, which will run for over 40 minutes, will feature announcements and updates for games created in Japan and across Asia, including interviews and new looks at anticipated titles, from “beloved series to distinctive indie creatures,” along with “a few other exciting updates.” It will be hosted by voice actor Yuki Kaji.

item.title: NEEDY STREAMER OVERLOAD TV anime announced
item.content:encoded:
• Anime

Set to begin airing in April 2026.

WSS playground, in cooperation with animation company Yostar Pictures, has announced a television anime adaption of point-and-click adventure game NEEDY STREAMER OVERLOAD (known as NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE in Japan). It will begin airing in April 2026. Preview screenings will be held at Theatre Shinjuku and Theatre Umeda sometime ahead of the official broadcast, featuring a specially edited theatrical cut of the anime episodes.

Here are the first details, via the official website:

Introduction

NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE is a multi-ending adventure game depicting 30 days in the life of a girl with an intense desire for validation who aims to become the ultimate streamer, with the support of “P.” Released on Steam in January 2022, the game garnered over three million downloads. Related music tracks have surpassed 400 million streams, cementing its status as an indie game that represents internet culture.

And now, April 2026. The girl who became a ray of light illuminating upon this chaotic internet of the Reiwa Era… OMGkawaiiAngel, affectionately known as “KAngel,” finally makes her TV anime debut.

The animation production is handled by Yostar Pictures, known for titles such as Arknights and Blue Archive. Director Masaoki Nakashima (affiliated with Yostar Pictures), who has worked on storyboarding and episode direction for Blue Archive and New PANTY & STOCKING with GARTERBELT, as well as the NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE short anime, will helm the project depicting a unique story and characters for the anime.

The anime adaptation about the “Internet Angel” who captivated the world begins!

OMGkawaiiAngel

OMGkawaiiAngel, affectionately known as “KAngel.”

Her wide range of activities, including streaming and various collaborations, are idolized by people of all ages. She watches over everyone as the internet angel, saving Japan’s Reiwa Era.

Staff

  • Original Work: WSS playground
  • Director: Masaoki Nakashima (Yostar Pictures)
  • Original Idea / Screenplay / Supervision: nyalra
  • Original Character Design: Ohisashiburi
  • Main Character Design: Kenji Saikai, Akari Takei ,Kaito Shimizu
  • Art Director: Ryuta Hayashi
  • 3DCG Artists: Kaoru Marumoto, Yume Sakai, Daisuke Katano
  • Color Setting: Naoto Kondo
  • 3DCG Animation Production: CHOTOTU
  • Visual Effects Design: Tailor Animation
  • Editor: Keisuke Yanagi, ACE
  • Compositing: Wu Jiann-horng
  • Music: Aiobahn +81, Sasuke Haraguchi, DE DE MOUSE
  • Sound Director: Fumiyuki Go
  • Sound Effects: Rei Ueno
  • Sound Production: Bit grooove promotion
  • Product Supervision: Ryosuke Inagaki
  • Animation Production: Yostar Pictures
